attributes.action: open all bus lanes to motorbikes across the UK now and stop messing about
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there has been enough tests  carried out by individual councils to prove that allowing motorbikes to use bus lanes presents no danger to anyone and this anti-bike campaign carried out by councils by them dragging their feet should be stopped

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "open all bus lanes to motorbikes across the UK now and stop messing about."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11594.asp
